apprentice general: You wonder if there are any Dark Forest leaders who would be willing to give you your warrior name.
As each moon goes by, you grow increasingly bored at the vase world of black muck.
You train vigorously, refusing to lose the skills you fought so hard for.
You watch as the Dark Forest Warriors train from the sidelines, wishing that they'd allow you to join.
You're too small for fights but you're too big for resting.
